DataElement.preferredName: Neurocognitive Function Quality of Life Assessment Ineligibility Reason Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The specified other reason in which the patient was not eligible to participate in the neurocognitive funciton and quality of life assessments

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neurocognitive Function Quality of Life Assessment Ineligibility Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the ability to think and reason. This includes the ability to concentrate, remember things, process information, learn, speak, and understand._The normal action performed by a structure or device._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Having to do with the ability to think and reason. This includes the ability to concentrate, remember things, process information, learn, speak, and understand.
The normal action performed by a structure or device.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
